metadata.title: CVE-2019-5427 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: c3p0 version < 0.9.5.4 may be exploited by a billion laughs attack when loading XML configuration due to missing protections against recursive entity expansion when loading configuration.

criterions.comment: c3p0 package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
